item.title: Reddit、2つの新しい広告プロダクトを発表：ブランドの製品ページに移動するコールトゥアクションボタンを備えた「Product Ads」と、「Contextual Keyword Targeting」（Nicola Agius/Search Engine Land)
item.description:
Nicola Agius / Search Engine Land:
Reddit launches two new ad products: Product Ads, with call-to-action buttons that go to a brand's product page, and Contextual Keyword Targeting  —  Reddit has launched Contextual Keyword Targeting and Product Ads, to help advertisers reach new and valuable audiences.

item.title: ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル、金融担当のチャールズ・フォレル氏を副編集長に任命、2002年にインターンとして入社 (Chris Roush/Talking Biz News)
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
The Wall Street Journal names finance editor Charles Forelle as deputy editor-in-chief; he joined the outlet in 2002 as an intern  —  Wall Street Journal editor in chief Emma Tucker sent out the following on Friday:  —  Dear all,  —  Charles Forelle is named Deputy Editor in Chief of The Wall Street Journal.

item.title: Los Angeles Times編集長Kevin Meridaのスタッフミーティングの詳細：マストヘッド解雇なし、56人のギルドメンバーには30日間の通知、一部の人にはバイアウトオプション（Meg James/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Meg James / Los Angeles Times:
Los Angeles Times Executive Editor Kevin Merida's staff meeting details: no masthead layoffs, 30-day notices for 56 guild members, and buyout options for some  —  Facing a raw and angry staff stunned by the announcement of 73 layoffs, Los Angeles Times Executive Editor Kevin Merida …

item.title: Starz/Lionsgate、アトランタのセット外でストライキを起こしたライターに向かって車を急発進させ、ブレーキをかけたとされるBMFプロデューサーを「脅迫」戦術として停止（Lesley Goldberg/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Lesley Goldberg / The Hollywood Reporter:
Starz/Lionsgate suspends a BMF producer after he allegedly sped his car toward striking writers outside the Atlanta set and braked, as an “intimidation” tactic  —  The matter is under investigation by the studio as well as the Writers Guild.

item.title: 欧州委員会は、ビベンディが出版グループEditisとGala誌の売却を約束した後、フランスの出版社Lagardereの買収を承認する（Elsa Keslassy/Variety)
item.description:
Elsa Keslassy / Variety:
The European Commission approves Vivendi's bid to acquire French publisher Lagardere, after Vivendi committed to sell publishing group Editis and Gala magazine  —  Vivendi, the parent company of Canal+ Group, has received the green light from the European Commission to proceed with the full acquisition …

item.title: ロイズがテレグラフ紙を管財人の手に委ねた財務上の圧力の高まりと、バークレイズの所有権の背後にある複雑な企業の網の目を紹介（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
A look at the growing financial pressures that led Lloyds to put The Telegraph into receivership and the complex web of companies behind the Barclays' ownership  —  Move by Lloyds to put debt-laden media group into receivership ends two decades of family's ownership

item.title: 2020年に立ち上げられた、7人の記者・編集者と$1M以上の予算で州政府を取材する非営利のニュースサイト「New York Focus」の2023年のプロフィール（Ginia Bellafante/New York Times）
item.description:
Ginia Bellafante / New York Times:
A profile of New York Focus, a nonprofit news site launched in 2020 that covers the state government with seven reporters and editors and a $1M+ budget in 2023  —  New York Focus zeros in on the details of what goes on in the state capital.  And the reporting has had some impressive results.

item.title: アンテナ：ネットフリックスは、パスワード共有の取り締まりが始まった5月25日から5月28日にかけて、少なくとも2019年以降の他の4日間よりも多くの米国加入者を獲得した（Isabella Simonetti/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Isabella Simonetti / Wall Street Journal:
Antenna: Netflix gained more US subscribers from May 25 to May 28, after its password-sharing crackdown began, than in any other four days since at least 2019  —  Shortly after change, company had highest rate of sign-ups since Antenna began tracking data in 2019

item.title: Project Veritas、創設者ジェームズ・オキーフが2023年2月にCEO職を辞任したことを受け、新CEOにハンナ・ガイルズを指名（Project Veritas）
item.description:
Project Veritas:
Project Veritas names Hannah Giles as its new CEO, following founder James O'Keefe's resignation from the CEO role in February 2023  —  From the headquarters of Project Veritas, Hannah Giles was announced as the CEO of the non-profit investigative journalism organization.

item.title: ラジオ司会者がChatGPTの幻覚をめぐる名誉毀損でOpenAIを提訴、ツールが詐欺と横領を告発する偽の法的訴状を作成したと主張（Isaiah Poritz/Bloomberg Law）
item.description:
Isaiah Poritz / Bloomberg Law:
A radio host sues OpenAI for defamation over a ChatGPT hallucination, alleging the tool generated a false legal complaint accusing him of fraud and embezzlement  —  OpenAI LLC is facing a defamation lawsuit from a Georgia radio host who claimed the viral artificial intelligence program ChatGPT generated …

item.title: DisneyのHotstarは、JioCinemaが最近同様の戦略で成功したのに続き、インドでクリケットのトーナメントをモバイル端末で無料ストリーミング提供する計画だ（Reuters）。
item.description:
Reuters:
Disney's Hotstar plans to offer free streaming of cricket tournaments in India on mobile devices, following JioCinema's recent success with a similar strategy  —  Walt Disney Co's (DIS.N) Hotstar will offer free streaming of cricket tournaments in India on mobile devices …

item.title: ジュリアン・アサンジは英国から米国への身柄引き渡しを不服として敗訴したが、英国および欧州人権裁判所に控訴の道がある（Katharine Gemmell/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Katharine Gemmell / Bloomberg:
Julian Assange loses an attempt to appeal his extradition from the UK to the US, but has avenues for appeal in the UK and the European Court of Human Rights  —  WikiLeaks chief Julian Assange has lost the latest attempt to appeal his extradition to the US to face criminal spying charges …

item.title: 韓国のエンターテインメント業界では、Netflixの支配力とグローバル配信への依存によって、Netflixが地元の配給会社に対して優位に立つことを懸念する声もある（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Some in South Korea's entertainment industry worry that Netflix's dominance and relying on its global distribution give Netflix an edge over local distributors  —  Despite a wave of international interest in South Korean film and television, the stock prices of many of the country's production companies have been in a slump.

item.title: 650Kの「オーディエンス・セグメント」を含む広告プラットフォームXandrのデータベースは、データブローカーがオンラインとオフラインの活動を監視して消費者を分類する方法を明らかにする（The Markup）。
item.description:
The Markup:
A database on ad platform Xandr containing 650K “audience segments” reveals how data brokers classify consumers by surveilling their online and offline activity  —  A spreadsheet on ad platform Xandr's website revealed a massive collection of “audience segments” …

item.title: FOXの幹部ラジ・シャーが同局を退社、トランプ大統領の元副報道官だったシャーはドミニオン社の訴訟でテキストメッセージが暴露された（Oliver Darcy/@oliverdarcy)
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / @oliverdarcy:
Fox executive Raj Shah has left the network; Shah, a former deputy press secretary under President Trump, had text messages exposed in the Dominion lawsuit  —  News in @ReliableSources: Senior Fox executive Raj Shah is OUT at the company, I'm told. Shah's brand protection efforts, which translated to pushing Fox News in an even more pro-Trump direction after the 2020 election, were exposed in the Dominion suit. https://view.newsletters.cnn.com/ ...
